column5: Finally managed to made it in to camp.. an hour of cutting deadfall on the trail but camp was in one piece when we arrived.. except for that sat dish and a chewed propane hose... ... boo hoo.  But it sure is nice to be home.    As always the weather heres changes so fast.   One thing that hasnt changed is Moniques ability to outfish me.. sigh..    Dock in, boats in water filled,  woods ready from the fall...  and saunas stoked..    Waters high and fast still so fishing tough but we managed a few.. just nice to be on the water again.    Blackflies are horrific.. lol.. took a ride on the bike today.. didnt dare stop.  Moniques reactions just get worse every year.. YIKES!!    LOL..  funny few days.. weather cant make up it mind..    But I can.. time for a drink and some porch time!!!
Now thats, an OFFICE desk. LOL  Looking forward to more reports BOSS.
Nice TJ! camp looks like heaven to me.

I see a "Crown" I had a teacher (typography) in '72, I also liked photography and took pictures of his wedding! My payment was a 1964 Crown, still have it! also collected the miniature ones after that!  Nice place, YOU have to learn how to outfish Monique lol.You can always blame " I was handling the boat" and not fishing.
Super nice slice of heaven you have there!!!
welcome back to the 'reports' side TJ and I hope you and the WHOLE fam has a great season up there this year
The world needs net men too?
looking great boss....man your camp has sure come along way.......hope you have a blast up there...keep the reports coming ....cheers
That camp has sure changed a lot. Looks great! How did you make out with maple syrup this year?  My woman always out fishes me too, so don't feel bad. They have the best guides around!!  S.
Looking good TJ. Funny I still have and use my old Bass Pro cooler cup. I'd hate to guess how many beers have been in her.
My woman NEVER outfishes me!  So MAN UP dood!    Camp Jiggy is cool!
Have fun guys!
I love the Jig reports. I never noticed the permanent building before TJ, when do you build it?  I guess you could say you are on "Crown" land!
~~~~I take it that the Pink cooler is yours. Great looken set up

Thanks everyone!   we put up the cabin a couple of years ago after the snow did a number on my tents.  The crown is the official liquor of Jiggy lol...  We do some improvements every year, new propane stove last year.. gonna bring a better bed for the guestroom this year.  getting big stuff up here and into camp is tough.. but a little easier this year with the clear cuts the are doing south of me.  Also I did manage to outfish Monique yesterday  8-0 !!!  and ohhhh did she hear about it!!!
Out fish her again and you'll be using the guest room!
Out fish her again and you'll be using the guest room!  OH it was worth it..... trust me... lol..
So she needs a new room mate
The place looks fantastic TJ!!! A real slice of heaven.
Need to drop in there again when you're home...
